Home Page

Introduction

I am a researcher who focuses on machine learning and data science projects. I have experience working on developing sentiment analysis tools for financial applications, a web scraper and parser for Yahoo and Google Finance, data visualizations and analyses in VR, data analysis for traffic accidents in NY City, and a tool for detecting clusters of suspicious voter registration activity. Details on my work are on my featured projects page.

Contact info is on my resume.

I am also a student at Caltech studying computer science and business, economics, and management.

You can learn more about my thinking and preferences by going to my thoughts page.

About This Website

This website is being built by scratch using Jekyll and Github Pages.
